thread.title: Instagram launches gif-like app Boomerang

title: Instagram launches gif-like app Boomerang
text:
Instagram launches gif-like app Boomerang 
The Telegraph Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Once downloaded, users simply tap a button to start the photo -taking process. Videos shot within Boomerang play forwards, then backwards, resulting in a gif-like effect. The app is now available to download for both iOS and Android....
